reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and precise
reviews.reviewText: So easy to pop on the wall (in my closet). Perfect for the space I had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased for Hen House
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a mirror or two to to entertain my hens, but the ones marketed specifically for birds--being novelty items--are small and pricey. So I searched for non-pet mirrors instead and came across these. I purchased a pair of the 8"8"s and they are so perfect! The two mirrors adhered right to the outer wall of my coop in their chicken run, and their shatterproof material makes them perfect for the girls to peck at all day (instead of pecking at each other). The reflection looked clear to me, but I know some reviewers gave a low rating due to the mirrors having a warped reflection. Even if that was the case (which I didn't notice), my hens don't care. They love it. At these prices I'll be buying a few more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not fogless at all
reviews.reviewText: I have never found a mirror that is truly fogless. These get the job done and are perfect for hanging in the shower to shave. They steam up but just run the water over it and you're good for 5 minutes. I brought one to my office and have it hanging there for quick makeup in the morning. Not heavy at all and are a perfect reflection. No distortion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Appears used or poorly packaged / scratched
reviews.reviewText: Opened the product and it already had scratches that couldn’t be wiped off. Also FYI does not come with the hook

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No hanging mechanism, just flat mirrors
reviews.reviewText: The mirrors look like the pictures, but they don't come with any adhesion/ hanging mechanisms. Buy some suction cups / 3M tapes if you are buying this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New and improved are better
reviews.reviewText: I was excited for these. One for my office and one for home. I was sent the new and improved replacement. Very nice seller. Followed up with me in every step. I would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars They came broken on one corner
reviews.reviewText: Disappointed they came broken but my husband didn’t tell my son not to open it so he did and put them up broken so can’t return them. So annoyed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023

reviews.reviewText: this mirror works great for my needs! i usually use this for when im applying my make up, fixing my eye brows, ect. brightness is enough for me, love that its rechargeable, very useful! not sure of the price as it is currently unavailable. not a bad product. works well for me!

reviews.reviewTitle: Convenient and Stylish "Touch Screen" Makeup Mirror
reviews.reviewText: Introduction:This "touch screen" makeup mirror with LED brightness control is an affordable and practical solution for makeup enthusiasts. This mirror offers a range of features, including adjustable LED brightness and the ability to switch between warm and cool lights. With its convenient touch screen functionality, modern design, and affordable price, it is a great addition to any makeup routine.Impressive Features and Functionality:The touch screen makeup mirror truly stands out with its array of features. The "touch screen" function allows users to effortlessly control the LED light's brightness, enabling them to find the perfect lighting for their makeup application. Additionally, the mirror offers the option to switch between warm and cool lights, accommodating different preferences and lighting needs. This versatility ensures that users can achieve optimal makeup results in any lighting condition.Convenient Rechargeable Battery:This makeup mirror is equipped with an internal battery, making it portable and eliminating the need for constant access to electrical outlets. The rechargeable battery can easily be powered up using a USB cable, providing added convenience for on-the-go use. With this feature, users can enjoy the benefits of a well-lit makeup mirror wherever they may be.Sleek and Modern Design:The design of this makeup mirror is both aesthetically pleasing and modern. Its sleek and compact form makes it a stylish addition to any vanity or bathroom counter. The mirror's contemporary look enhances the overall appeal of the space, adding a touch of elegance to the user's makeup routine.Affordable Price Point:One of the great aspects of this touch screen makeup mirror is its affordability. Despite its impressive features and functionality, it is priced at a level that is accessible to a wide range of customers. This makes it an excellent choice for those seeking a reliable and versatile makeup mirror without breaking the bank.Conclusion:The touch screen makeup mirror with LED brightness control is an affordable and convenient solution for makeup enthusiasts. With its touch screen functionality, users can easily adjust the LED light's brightness and switch between warm and cool lights to create the perfect makeup application environment. The inclusion of a rechargeable battery and its sleek, modern design further enhance its appeal. Considering its affordability and impressive features, this makeup mirror is an excellent choice for anyone looking to elevate their makeup routine without breaking the bank.

I ordered this mirror because I travel a lot for work and am tired of the dim hotel room light for putting on my makeup. This travel mirror is so handy and fixed my problem! It has three light settings, though I generally just use the 'daylight' setting so I can see everything in stark light. It is a great size 'screen' wise so you can see your whole face even though it's a travel mirror. So far the brightness and battery performance are operating as expected. The one note I would say is that it's a bit thicker than expected, and doesn't have a face protector so be mindful of that when traveling with it. I just wrap it in my clothes in my suitcase to ensure it's well protected on the go.

If you are looking for a mirror that's not too big, that you do not need to hold up manually and that will allow you to see yourself with average clarity then this is a decent choice.To me, the lights do not help that much as the overall clarity is still just average. I would not use this as a make-up mirror but I would consider using it as a simple regular mirror in a bedroom or desk area that did not already have one.

reviews.reviewTitle: i use this for my make up desk- works great!
reviews.reviewText: have a small make up desk in my bedroom- but no mirror. this was a great alternative!! bright enough light, but also small enough to not take up a lot of space- also large enough so you can see your full face as well! best of both worlds- works great for my needs, and i'm very happy i found this item!! price at time of this review is $ 21.99- not a bad price for what you get. i'm happy with this find- and i find it to be also a budget diy item for small spaces! would for sure recommend this item!!
